title: @Riot - YoloMouse bannable offense?

embed.description: Official download: https://pandateemo.github.io/YoloMouse/ If you have problems: https://www.reddit.com/r/yolomouse/

body:
Hi

Just wanted to know if using this mouse reskin software is a bannable offense before actually trying it. ;)

Please watch the video too, to see what it actually does. :D

replies.body: Personally i think something like this should be implemented within the game, it would just be a nice quality of life change as it would tailor to individual players preferences.

We don't support third party modifications in general, and reskin cursors could result in gaining an unfair advantage.  Check out our [third party guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848)for more info, but I'd advise caution in this case.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EA6OExeQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-11T16:57:08.314+0000)
>
> We don't support third party modifications in general, and reskin cursors could result in gaining an unfair advantage.  Check out our [third party guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848)for more info, but I'd advise caution in this case.

Then Riot needs to fix how shitty the League client mouse is in a 4K monitor. The pointer does not scale with the DPI, so It's tiny on a 4K monitor, even a big one like mine, because it gets lost among particles and motion. It's almost impossible to keep track of during a team fight, to the point where it seriously reduces playability.

Yolomouse suddenly stopped working with a recent patch, now it keeps changing back to the normal pointer, though it remembers the Yolo pointer if I put the mouse over the exact spot where I set it. 

It looks like moving the cursor to the edge of the screen to scroll the camera always resets the pointer, though bizarrely it is changing it to a white Windows-style mouse, not the even-more invisible game mouse, which is almost impossible to see even when farming minions, much less in a fight against a player.

Since then, I've cut way back on playing, and mostly just ARAM if I do, because my ability to participate in team fights is dramatically reduced.

Post Script: It turns out that the problem with Yolomouse was fixed by making it full screen, instead of borderless. Apparently, the latter mode is implemented poorly, so that the mouse is leaving the game window by a pixel and being reverted to a Windows pointer.
So, let me ask in another way - Is there a non bannable way to change your mouse skin? ;)
